mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Sleepy Lagoon boys are pronounced innocent (draft)

mods:mods.mods:note: Endore writes of the successful appeal of the convictions in the Sleepy Lagoon trial. He particularly points out the findings of Appellate Court Judge Thomas P. White that Judge Fricke, the Sleepy Lagoon trial presiding judge, had denied the defendants a fair trial through his rulings
